snippet.title: Depths of Sanity: Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The year is 1999.

For the last decade, a series of deep resonance frequencies have been detected, originating from a variety of points throughout the Pacific Ocean. These sounds appeared to be random at first, but over the course of this year, they have begun to converge on a single point: latitude 48°52.6′S, longitude 123°23.6′W, commonly referred to as the “Oceanic Pole of Inaccessibility”.

The GOAA (Global Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration) dispatched the GOAA Vigilant and its crew of seven to investigate the frequencies. Soon after the Vigilant was dispatched, the crew relayed a scrambled message and all radio contact was lost.

It’s been two days since the message was received, and  researchers have not been able to decipher the message. As a GOAA Commander, you’ve taken it upon yourself to find the missing crew and bring them home safely.

Find out more at BombShelterGames.com
Follow us on Twitter: @Bomb_Shelter
